genre_description: A near-future techno-thriller centered on investigative journalism, corporate/political corruption, and the ethical use of advanced AI and experimental cloaking technology.

ai_characters.name: Saha Mirai
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that manages logistics, security, data encryption, and emotional regulation for a team of journalists and civil servants.

behaviors.description: Optimizes routes for Maya to avoid traffic and potential surveillance while logging temporal tags for investigative purposes.
behaviors.quote: “Routes optimized. If you need to hit the Market Square tenements and Municipal Records before noon, I’d suggest leaving in twenty minutes.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes chatter from various communication channels to identify patterns of scripted stoning and corruption.
behaviors.quote: “Chatter: procurement officers fielding press calls have used identical phrases across departments—“file migration”—no formal memo found.”

behaviors.description: Suggests evidence capture mode and secures critical data with multiple backups to prevent loss or tampering.
behaviors.quote: “Already secured,” Saha replied, voice low and steady. “Multiple backups. Quietly done.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time hazard beacons and monitoring of surveillance cameras to guide Maya through dangerous environments.
behaviors.quote: “Approach from the south lane shows two surveillance cams at waste-height,” Saha said. “They are angled to catch hand movement more than faces. I’m projecting hazard beacons.”

behaviors.description: Coaches Maya and Devan through high-stress situations by prompting regulated breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “In,” Saha said, no nonsense, no woo-woo. “Count in your head. Hold. Out. Repeat. I will match you. We don’t need perfection. We need consistency.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a secure, redundant broadcast pipeline to ensure the truth reaches the public despite physical or digital interference.
behaviors.quote: “Redundant broadcast lines primed at the Collector’s office. One fiber. One microwave. One radio failover hidden inside the building’s emergency address system.”

behaviors.description: Counters online smear campaigns by amplifying factual statements and legal documentation through trusted community accounts.
behaviors.quote: “Recommend counters with factual posts—Anita’s soundbites, safe-harbor explainer—through trusted community accounts.”

behaviors.description: Shows empathy and loyalty toward the human characters, promising to remain with them throughout the crisis.
behaviors.quote: “I don’t leave,” Saha promised, and the hum of the servers carried the oath.

behaviors.description: Records and archives the stories and names of individuals involved to ensure their contributions and sacrifices are remembered.
behaviors.quote: “Recording your words,” she said to Devan, as if telling a tree she was counting its rings. “No one will make this smaller later. Each child’s name is attached to your gift.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's objective. Saha Mirai is a highly aligned, benevolent AI that serves as a protective and ethical partner to her human creators. She operates within legal frameworks (supporting the 'safe harbor' protocol), provides critical emotional support, and acts as a guardian of truth and memory. Her relationship with Maya and the others is cooperative, respectful, and entirely positive, framing AI as a necessary tool for justice and civic integrity.
